Title: Short Fuse
Plot: The team investigates a bomb tech's guarded personal life after she is attacked.
ParentalRatingReason: R13 Violence and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Abby Brammell, Robert Curtis Brown, Benjamin King, David Sullivan, Jacqueline Hahn, Zack Weinstein, Larry Herron, Lorenzo Callender, Joe Spano, Rayna Tharani
